author: Phil Vickery
method: Mix the hot penne with the other ingredients (the residual heat from the pasta will heat the other ingredients to give you a warm pasta dish). Serve.
ingredients: 150g/5¼oz penne, cooked according to packet instructions,  100g/3½oz olives, chopped,  100g/3½oz tinned tuna, drained,  50g/1½oz parmesan, grated,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp flatleaf parsley, chopped
